original_text: And an angel of the Lord appeared to them, and the glory of the Lord shone around them, and they were filled with great fear.
korean_text: 주의 사자가 곁에 서고 주의 영광이 그들을 두루 비추매 크게 무서워하는지라

sentences.original_text: And an angel of the Lord appeared to them
and the glory of the Lord shone around them
and they were filled with great fear.
